sentences.sContent: His work was acclaimed by art critics.
sentences.sCn: 他的作品得到艺术评论家的推崇。

sentences.sContent: Angela Bassett has won critical acclaim for her excellent performance.
sentences.sCn: 安杰拉·巴西特因她出色的表演而赢得了评论界的赞扬。

remMethod.val: ac(加强) + claim(叫喊) → 不断大叫 → 向…欢呼， 为…喝彩

trans.tranOther: to praise someone or something publicly
Acclaim is public praise for someone or something
